languages.text: Языки ласеракса вывалились из разинутой пасти, а из раздробленной головы течет густая кровь. Судя по кусочкам мозга и костей на прутьях, бестия билась о решетку до последнего.

The lacerax's tongues have fallen out of its open maw, and a thick stream of blood is oozing from its shattered skull. Judging by the pieces of bone and brain matter stuck to the bars, the beast was slamming its head against them until the end.
languages.original_text: Языки ласеракса вывалились из разинутой пасти, а из раздробленной головы течет густая кровь. Судя по кусочкам мозга и костей на прутьях, бестия билась о решетку до последнего.

traits.locale_text: The lacerax's tongues have fallen out of its open maw. Thick blood is oozing out of its shattered skull. Judging by the bits of bone and brain matter stuck to the bars, the beast slammed its head against them until the end.

languages.text: ラセラックスの舌は大きく開いた口から垂れ下がり、砕けた頭蓋からは濃い血がとろとろと流れ出していた。鉄格子にこびりついた骨片と脳の残骸から察するに、この獣は最後の瞬間まで、自分の頭を格子に打ち続けていたようだ。
languages.original_text: The lacerax's tongues have fallen out of its open maw, and a thick stream of blood is oozing from its shattered skull. Judging by the pieces of bone and brain matter stuck to the bars, the beast was slamming its head against them until the end.

traits.locale_text: ラセラックスの舌は大きく開いた口から垂れ下がり、砕けた頭蓋からは濃い血がとろとろと流れ出していた。鉄格子にこびりついた骨片と脳の残骸から察するに、この獣は最後の瞬間まで、自分の頭を格子に打ち続けていたようだ。

languages.text: Laseraksın dili ağzından dışarı sarkmış, kırık kafatasından akan kanlar kalınca bir yol çizmiş. Parmaklıklara yapışan kemik ve beyin parçalarına bakılırsa canavar, ölene dek kafasını onlara vurmuş.
languages.original_text: The lacerax's tongues have fallen out of its open maw, and a thick stream of blood is oozing from its shattered skull. Judging by the pieces of bone and brain matter stuck to the bars, the beast was slamming its head against them until the end.

traits.locale_text: Laseraksın dili ağzından dışarı sarkmış, kırık kafatasından akan kanlar kalınca bir yol çizmiş. Parmaklıklara yapışan kemik ve beyin parçalarına bakılırsa, canavar ölene dek kafasını onlara vurmuş.

languages.text: Las lenguas del lacerax salen de sus fauces abiertas y un espeso río de sangre mana de su cráneo destrozado. A juzgar por los trozos de hueso y cerebro pegados a los barrotes, la bestia los golpeó hasta el fin.
languages.original_text: The lacerax's tongues have fallen out of its open maw, and a thick stream of blood is oozing from its shattered skull. Judging by the pieces of bone and brain matter stuck to the bars, the beast was slamming its head against them until the end.

traits.locale_text: Las lenguas del lacerax salen de sus fauces abiertas y un espeso río de sangre mana de su cráneo destrozado. A juzgar por los trozos de hueso y cerebro pegados a los barrotes, la bestia los golpeó hasta el fin.

languages.text: 这只异虎大张着嘴，耷拉的舌头垂在外面，浓稠的鲜血正从它破碎的头颅里向外渗着。从黏在牢笼上的骨头与脑浆判断，这头异虎生前应该是一直在用头撞栅栏，直到最后一刻。
languages.original_text: The lacerax's tongues have fallen out of its open maw, and a thick stream of blood is oozing from its shattered skull. Judging by the pieces of bone and brain matter stuck to the bars, the beast was slamming its head against them until the end.

traits.locale_text: 这只异虎大张着嘴，耷拉的舌头垂在外面，浓稠的鲜血正从它破碎的头颅里向外渗着。从黏在牢笼上的骨头与脑浆判断，这头异虎生前应该是一直在用头撞栅栏，直到最后一刻。

languages.text: Les langues du lacérax sont sorties de sa gueule béante et un flot de sang poisseux dégouline de son crâne fracassé. À en juger par les bouts d'os et de matière grise collés sur les barreaux, la bête a dû se cogner la tête contre les parois de sa cage jusqu'à ce que mort s'ensuive.
languages.original_text: The lacerax's tongues have fallen out of its open maw, and a thick stream of blood is oozing from its shattered skull. Judging by the pieces of bone and brain matter stuck to the bars, the beast was slamming its head against them until the end.

traits.locale_text: Les langues du lacérax sont sorties de sa gueule béante et un flot de sang poisseux dégouline de son crâne fracassé. À en juger par les bouts d'os et de matière grise collés sur les barreaux, la bête a dû se cogner la tête contre les parois de sa cage jusqu'à ce que mort s'ensuive.

languages.text: Die Zungen des Lacerax sind aus seinem offenen Maul gefallen, und Blut sickert aus seinem eingeschlagenen Schädel. Den Knochensplittern und der Hirnmasse an den Gitterstäben nach zu urteilen, hat er seinen Kopf gegen das Gitter geschlagen, bis er tot war.
languages.original_text: The lacerax's tongues have fallen out of its open maw, and a thick stream of blood is oozing from its shattered skull. Judging by the pieces of bone and brain matter stuck to the bars, the beast was slamming its head against them until the end.

traits.locale_text: Die Zungen des Lacerax sind aus seinem offenen Maul gefallen, und Blut sickert aus seinem eingeschlagenen Schädel. Den Knochensplittern und der Hirnmasse an den Gitterstäben nach zu urteilen, hat er seinen Kopf gegen das Gitter geschlagen, bis er tot war.
